name: VersaCoin
description: VersaCoin is a Proof of Work (PoW) cryptocurrency that is designed to be secure, fast and ideal for wide spread adoption in both public and private commerce. VersaCoin incorporates unique features to insure blockchain integrity and eliminates feeble "work-arounds" to address capacity. Its 32MB blocks, confirming every two minutes, means that it offers one of the greatest transaction throughputs of any crypto available today. The world is changing and it demands a digital currency that is able to keep up.
